author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Investis Holding Successfully Issues Fixed-Rate Bond With Volume Of CHF 100 Mln
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - INVESTIS HOLDING SA:
* SUCCESSFULLY ISSUES ANOTHER FIXED-RATE BOND WITH A VOLUME OF CHF 100 MILLION
* PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO REPAY BANK LOANS FROM LAST TWO REAL ESTATE TRANSACTIONS
* PAYMENT DATE OF BOND IS SCHEDULED FOR 12 JUNE 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
